title: Who made the Master Chef Tahm Kench Splash Art?
body:
The art is beautiful! The details put in are sooooo nice! Every splash art keeps getting better and better! Respect.


Oh and that poor Poro trying to escape the cage. HAHA. Save the Poros!

replies.body:
It was the wonderful Alex Flores! Although the whole skins team put a lot of work into the feedback and direction of each piece. Oh and the choice of ingredients well... I may have had a hand in that >:D

http://alexflores.deviantart.com/

Hahaha, I knew it!
He has such a unique and beautiful art style, I always recognize which splashes he makes- I just love his style. :D
I often go over to his desk just to make fanboy noises. All of the splash team are humble, friendly and super talented. I really hope we can start going to event again next year.

> I often go over to his desk just to make fanboy noises.

Man, I'd probably do the same if I was a Rioter. XD

Is that the scuttlecrab? HOW VERY DARE HE.

Poro is fine.

I cant help but appreciate the art too.
Who ever drew that, good work! ^_^
The detail is stunning!

I didnt even notice the poro, so cute!
TAHM YOU MONSTER!!!!! Leave the little poros alone Braun will hear about this I swear!
Huh, so I wonder if Chef Tahm cooks up a nice Manbacon in the morning?
Not the poroo! Let him out, you vile fiend! {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:31}}
